The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote:
Mole: "Sometimes I want to say "I love you all" but I find it difficult"
Boy: "Do you?"
Mole: "Yes, so I say something like I'm glad we're all here"
Boy: "Okay"
Mole: "I'm glad we're all here."
Boy: "We're so glad you're here too"
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote: Horse: "You fell, but I have got you"
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote: Horse: "I know, tears fall for a reason, and are your strength, not weakness."
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote: Horse: "Life is difficult, but you are loved."
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote:
Boy: "What is the bravest thing you've ever said?"
Horse: "Help. Asking for help isn't giving up, it is to refusing to give up."
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.quote: Fox: "You know, sometimes, your minds plays tricks on you. It can tell you you are not good, that it's all hopeless, but I discovered this: You are loved and important, and you bring to this world things, that no one else can. So hold on."
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.author: Charlie Mackery
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse.found in: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Once upon a time.quote: Our actions are own, but fate pushes us.
Once upon a time.author: Regina

Genshin Impact.quote: All things are impermanent and to exist is to suffer
Genshin Impact.author: Xiao

Genshin Impact.quote: I arrived only in time to hear her dying breath. Why did she go to Khaenri'ah first, and not I. Why did she keep me in the dark about it? Was it to shield me? [...] Facing the fact that she is gone is... unbearably painful
Genshin Impact.author: Raiden Ei

Genshin Impact.quote: For those that live too long, the friends of days gone by and scenes from their adventures live on in their memories. As such I have no regrets in meeting you, friend. Should the day ever come that we are not together, you will continue to shine like gold in my memories.
Genshin Impact.author: Zhongli

Wanda Vision.quote: You are my sadness and my hope. But mostly, you're my love.
Wanda Vision.author: Wanda Maximoff

Wanda Vision.quote: There are rules in life. We can’t rush aging just because it’s convenient. And we can’t reverse death
Wanda Vision.author: Wanda Maximoff

Loki.quote: No one bad is every truly bad. And no one good is ever truly good.
Loki.author: Loki

Loki.quote: Freedom is life's great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart, you will know peace.
Loki.author: Loki

Star vs. the forces of the evil.quote: Feelings are worth feeling, even if they hurt
Star vs. the forces of the evil.author: Eclipsa
Star vs. the forces of the evil.found in: Star vs. the forces of the evil

Naruto.quote: It may be that a perfect being does not exist at all in the whole world. Sometimes two people who appear to be completely opposite are actually two sides of the same coin and can only succeed when they work together.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: True change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: The eyes sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Loneliness is dangerous. Once you know how addicting it is, you don't want to deal with people anymore.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Use your insecurities to improve yourself, not to self-destruct and destroy others
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Sometimes you have to be the bad guy to do something good, or you have to be the good guy to do something bad.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love for power, the world will know peace.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: People's live don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Time doesn't heal anything. It just teaches us how to live with pain.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: No matter how good your heart is, eventually you have to start treating people the way they treat you.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts besides us.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: Each of us lives dependent and bound by our individual knowledge and our awareness. All that is what we call reality. However, both knowledge and awareness are equivocal. One's reality might be another's illusion. We all live inside our own fantasies.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Naruto.quote: No matter who you are, you do not truly know what kind of man you will become until you reach the very end.
Naruto.author: Itachi Uchiha

Fate Stay Night.quote: The wish of wanting everyone to be happy is merely a fairy tale!
Fate Stay Night.author: Archer

Fate Stay Night.quote: If you walk down the path that you believe is right, you cannot be wrong.
Fate Stay Night.author: Shirou Emiya

Fate Stay Night.quote: That is why I will keep running for now. If I aim for the distance, there should come a day when I would be able to reach out to what I have been aiming for.
Fate Stay Night.author: Shirou Emiya

Fate Stay Night.quote: If you have a wish, don’t go back to the past and redo everything. If you want to change yourself, don’t change the past, but change who you are now!
Fate Stay Night.author: Shirou Emiya

Fate Stay Night.quote: People cannot change the past. All we can do, is accept our own actions. If you still wish to be burdened by your sins, let it show in your future actions. It is your choice how to perceive something that has already happened.
Fate Stay Night.author: Kirei Kotomine

One Piece.quote: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
One Piece.author: Monkey D. Luffy

One Piece.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future
One Piece.author: Monkey D. Luffy

One Piece.quote: No matter how hard or how impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal
One Piece.author: Monkey D. Luffy
